short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delete Facebookâ„¢ activities - Posts, Comments, Messages, Photos, Videos in Bulk

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Take control of your digital footprint on Facebook with the powerful "Delete My Activity for Facebookâ„¢" browser extension! Designed to give you unparalleled command over your activity log, this innovative tool makes privacy management on Facebook easier than ever before.

Our cutting-edge extension offers a suite of features that empower you to declutter your Facebook history in a few simple clicks. Imagine being able to erase years of posts, likes, and comments without the hassle of going through them one by one. With "Delete My Activity for Facebookâ„¢", that power is at your fingertips.

Key Features:

Batch Deletion: Effortlessly remove multiple Facebook activities swiftly and efficiently. Save your valuable time while ensuring your online presence reflects only what you choose to keep.

Filter by Date: Zoom into specific timeframes and clear out unwanted posts from any particular period. Whether it's yesterday's rant or last year's memories, your Facebook timeline obeys your command.

Keyword Inclusion/Exclusion: Curate your virtual presence with precision. Our intelligent keyword feature allows you to pinpoint activities containing certain words to retain or eliminate, offering a personalized cleaning experience.

User-Friendly Interface: Whether you're a tech wizard or a casual user, our extension is built for ease of use. With a simple and intuitive dashboard, you'll find maintaining your Facebook activity log a breeze.

Regular Updates: Stay ahead of the curve with regular upgrades designed to keep the extension functioning smoothly, protecting your privacy effectively against the ever-evolving interface of Facebook.

Are you ready to redefine your social media experience? With "Delete My Activity for Facebookâ„¢", reclaim your privacy, curate your past, and enjoy a pristine Facebook profile that mirrors only your current interests and persona. Download now and embark on a journey to a clearer, more intentional Facebook presence.

Facebook privacy tool, delete Facebook activity, batch remove posts, Facebook activity log, clean up Facebook, browser extension for Facebook, manage Facebook history, digital footprint cleaner, Facebook timeline cleaner.

Additional Features:
In the Popup, we provide the following additional features:

Find more extensions: This is a promotional link if you want to discover more browser extensions developed by ESUIT.
Buy me a coffee: If you'd like to support our future updates and maintenance, you can use this feature to buy us a cup of coffee.
Report a bug: If you encounter any issues, you can get in touch with us through this link, and we will assist you in fixing it.
Rate Chrome Store options: If you enjoy using this extension, you can click here to rate it.
